lyric.verse: Ruri iro no nami wo miite Namanamashii nekumori wa Shizuka ni yobiaii Omokage wa yuudachi no yoo ni Kegare nai no wa todoka nai kara Okashita hibi made utsukushii dake de
lyric.chorus: * Anata no uta ga Kikoenai yoo ni Mimi o fusaide Anata no yubi ga Shimitsuita made Jyoozu ni Arukeru Hazu mo nai no ni Watashi wa doko e?
lyric.verse: Waratte to anata wa iu Akai kutsu de odotte to Sasayaku sore demo Ajisai wa shinde shimatta Uzuki sasu no wa kenage na hadade Itandeiku no wa natsukashii keshi ki
lyric.chorus: repeat * Karamaru shita wo Kiri otoshita no wa Anata jya nakute Motsuweta ude ni Me wo tateta no wa Ima sara Minamo ni Yugamu kage Saa watashi wa doko e?

translator.translatorname: Mika Arita, Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy

lyric.verse: Winding an azure wave, these vivid warmths are calmly calling out to each other Image is like a sudden shower It will never get direty because it never reaches Even those sinful days look beautiful
lyric.chorus: * I shut my ears not to hear your song I know I can't even walk well With this body stained by your finger print where am I going?
lyric.verse: Smile, you said Dance iwth red shoes, you whispered but that hydrangea has passed away Laudable skin starts aching sweet scenery starts to be soiled
lyric.chorus: repeat * I shut my ears not to hear your song I go farther with this body stained by your finger print It wasn't you who cut off those tangled tongues It wasn't you who scratched our arms The shadow is twisting on the water surface So, where am I going?
